replies.body: Why you decided create Cronus?
replies.body_tagged: Why you decided create Cronus?

replies.body:
It's been that long?! I remember our days as junior camping up in the staff lounge. ^.^ Then you joined the senior staff team and it was teamwork all over again. ;D Great to see how far you've come and you're still going strong! 

1. Favourite season?
2. Would you rather drown or suffocate? Complete opposite. I think
3. Have you ever been embarrassed when someone asks you why you play Minecraft? :P
4. If you could change the moderator team colours (Junior, Mod, Senior, Admin), what would they be?

replies.body: Is it (much) harder than the life of a normal Moderator? And does it make fun?
replies.body_tagged: Is it (much) harder than the life of a normal Moderator? And does it make fun?

replies.body:
Ah, honestly, it's actually probably a bit easier, since we aren't required to moderate as much but having said that it still demands certain skills, like leadership, and our time. Life of a senior moderator is just handling appeals, questions, applications and overall helping the Administrators in their role. 

Lets just put it this way, if it wasn't fun i would have already left the staff team. That being said it can definitely be difficult at times, demoting staff members, waking up at 5am for meetings and having to come up with solutions under alot of pressure.
replies.body_tagged:
Ah, honestly, it's actually probably a bit easier, since we aren't required to moderate as much but having said that it still demands certain skills, like leadership, and our time. Life of a senior moderator is just handling appeals, questions, applications and overall helping the Administrators in their role. 

Lets just put it this way, if it wasn't fun i would have already left the staff team. That being said it can definitely be difficult at times, demoting staff members, waking up at 5am for meetings and having to come up with solutions under alot of pressure.
